element.name: Blot on the Landscape by Windsockers, Multi-cache (1/1.5)

long-description.p:
The existing landfill at Balleally has been in operation since 1971. Balleally is currently the largest landfill in the Dublin Region, accepting all waste generated within Fingal County Council and those wastes from Dublin Corporation and South Dublin County Council.
The old landfill was designed on a "dilute and disperse" principle with no leachate containment measures put in place which is typical of landfills of this age in this country.
The site is due to close in 2010/11 and there are plans to turn the area into a park.

The cache is a small decon box please rehide it well to prevent muggles from discovering its location.
To find the cache goto the above coords and take note of the year call this ABCD also take note of the nearby two digit number call this EF
The cache can be found at N53 30.(A+E)(B-E)(B-C)W6 07.C(B-A)A

element.additional-waypoints:
FN1ZA5V - GC1ZA5V Final
N/S __ 째 __ . ___ W/E ___ 째 __ . ___

ul.li:
2010-05-04T19:00:00Z : Found it by Wilddrude
This was the last day of our vacation in Ireland and also the very last cache. A really nice country with lots of nice caches around and even more friendly people.
Thanks for the cache and greetings from Germany, Wilddrude

2010-05-04T19:00:00Z : Found it by Geo Chief
That was a nice walk on the beach to find this cache. This was sadly our last cache in Ireland.
Thanks for the cache Geo Chief

2010-03-17T13:33:09Z : Found it by orangetigerprawn
What a tip this place looks like a dump! Nice spot apart from the carbuncle.
Tftc.

2010-02-14T20:00:00Z : Found it by AbbeyAckbar
(#611 @ 15:55) Our last find of a great days caching [:)] We found 8 in total. 4 different cache types : 3 traditionals, 2 multis, 1 earthcache and 1 letter box hybrid [^] This was a nice short multi to end the day with. Ackbar made the find. We got a nice surprise when we discovered a geocoin in it which we exchanged for a Green Jeep TB which has made it's way over from America.
SL. TFTC.

2010-01-23T20:00:00Z : Found it by Fjon
Tricky car manouver to get out of here! Nice easy cache. The girls playing in their garden nearby seemed suspicious though.

wpt.name: GC1ZA5V
wpt.desc: Blot on the Landscape by Windsockers, Multi-cache (1/1.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Blot on the Landscape
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The existing landfill at Balleally has been in operation since 1971. Balleally is currently the largest landfill in the Dublin Region, accepting all waste generated within Fingal County Council and those wastes from Dublin Corporation and South Dublin County Council.
The old landfill was designed on a "dilute and disperse" principle with no leachate containment measures put in place which is typical of landfills of this age in this country.

The site is due to close in 2010/11 and there are plans to turn the area into a park.

The Cache

The cache is a small decon box please rehide it well to prevent muggles from discovering its location.
To find the cache goto the above coords and take note of the year call this ABCD also take note of the nearby two digit number call this EF
The cache can be found at N53 30.(A+E)(B-E)(B-C)W6 07.C(B-A)A





The Windsockers


Additional Waypoints

FN1ZA5V - GC1ZA5V Final
N/S __ 째 __ . ___ W/E ___ 째 __ . ___

Thanks for the cache and greetings from Germany, Wilddrude

That was a nice walk on the beach to find this cache. This was sadly our last cache in Ireland.
Thanks for the cache Geo Chief

What a tip this place looks like a dump! Nice spot apart from the carbuncle.
Tftc.

Ackbar made the find. We got a nice surprise when we discovered a geocoin in it which we exchanged for a Green Jeep TB which has made it's way over from America.
SL. TFTC.
